title: Prometheus
description: A team of explorers discover a clue to the origins of mankind on Earth, leading them on a journey to the darkest corners of the universe.

title: Alien: Covenant
description: The crew of a colony ship stumbles upon a seemingly uncharted paradise, only to encounter terrifying creatures and the mystery of their origins.

title: Alien
description: The crew of the commercial spacecraft Nostromo encounters a deadly extraterrestrial lifeform.

title: Alien: Romulus
description: A new chapter in the Alien universe, with details still classified.

title: Aliens
description: Ripley returns with a unit of colonial marines to face the alien creatures.

title: Alien 3
description: Ripley crash-lands on a prison planet and must survive against a new breed of alien.

title: Alien: Resurrection
description: Ripley is resurrected and must fight a new kind of alien aboard a space vessel.
